features: 【Stay COOL Anywhere Anytime】Feeling hot? You need to go outside but also have no hands to hold regular portable fan? Why not always stay cool with this wearable neck fan? You can hang the fan around your neck and take it everywhere, will not feel tired or uncomfortable.Say goodbye to hot flashes, sweating, and flushing. (No Standalone lithium batteries are sold with the product)

【Hands-free Design & Stylish 】 The neck fan is designed to sit comfortably around your neck, allowing you to keep your hands free while enjoying a cool breeze. With its vibrant LED light and sleek design, this portable neck fan is not only functional but also stylish, and it's perfect for outdoor activities or working in a stuffy office, this necklace fan will keep you feeling refreshed and cool. The colorful LED light makes it perfect for concerts, festivals, or outdoor parties.

【3 Adjustable Speeds & long-lasting Use 】 Equipped with 3 adjustable speeds, the neck fan offers customizable airflow for your ultimate comfort. The built-in 4000 mAh battery ensures long-lasting use, while the one-button control makes it easy to switch between light and blow speed.

【Low Noise Design & Safe】 The upgraded powerful motor operates at a low noise level for peaceful use. While the bladeless design, it's safe for both children and the elderly, say goodbye to the fear of hair getting caught in fan blades, our Neck Fan is the perfect solution for staying cool on the go.

【100% Satisfaction or Your Money-back】 High quality cooler fan with a great price, you will never get disappointed to own this cool pernsonal fan this summer. We are responsible for our products and customers. If you have any problems with our product, please contact with us first, we will solve it for you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you cool!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great option for keeping you cool on hot days! It fits my neck well and is not too heavy.The fan blows great with 3 different settings, high, medium, and low. It is not too loud. The color changing LED lights on the sides are a neat touch, but you can turn that feature off if you want to.I wore this to two different outdoor concerts in the Texas heat and it kept me comfortable. I got a lot of questions about where I got it. All of those people dying from heat wished that they had one.It seems to last several hours on one charge. When you do have to charge it, it charges quickly.Overall it is well made, works great, and is a good value. I ended up buying a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet fan that you forget your wearing it
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a quiet neck fan to use underneath an inflatable Halloween costume for my 12 year old stepson. The fan is small and portable, and comes with a USB cable to plug into a power source. The fan has a flexible neck that allowed it to be adjusted to the desired angle, making it very convenient.My stepson wore the fan underneath her costume and it was a lifesaver! The fan kept him cool and comfortable during a long day of trick-or-treating. He was able to stay in costume the whole time without getting too hot and sweaty. When he removed his costume the fan was so quiet and comfortable he forgot he was wearing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product, short battery life
reviews.reviewText: I am always hot and sweaty especially when I am working on my furniture business and I saw this little gem on TikTok and needed one right away, this one was similar and better price so I bought it. It certainly helps me stay cool and is GREAT for hot flashes. It has 3 fan settings and the middle one works well for me, but the only downside is the battery life isn’t that great. I was doing a furniture project and it died within the hour. Maybe I got a lemon? I would buy this again and I might give my sister one as a gift. I do not use the lights on it but they are pretty cool. Also, watch your hair if it’s longer. My hair is only a medium length and if the fan shifts my hair sometimes gets stuck in it but not to the point I have to cut it off. I like this and might also get a second one for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and quiet, great fan
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this fan so much that I bought a second one to leave at work. It is quite powerful and still very quiet. It has three fan settings (low, medium, high) and two light settings (disco or blue). I use it intermittently and find that one charge will last several days.The low/med settings are very effective and still quiet enough for normal conversation/activities. The highest setting is quite a lil breeze and loud enough to be noticeable, but I find the lower settings to be more than enough. Also the disco lights are a big crowd pleaser if you decide to turn them on.I’ve tried the wrap around neck fans as well, and while they are less obtrusive, they are also FAR less effective than this guy. This is an excellent product for the price, and a must have for any women going through The Change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this item
reviews.reviewText: I love this. It keeps me cool at outdoor events. Stays charged for several hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Be extremely careful around long hair
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this fan for our trip to Walt Disney World. I knew we would be going during the middle of the summer and the temperature in Florida was going to be extreme. Overall, it's not a bad fan. It was a little louder than I was expecting when running, but I was thankful for the air it provided. It did give off a pretty decent amount of air when running. However, I deducted two stars because it died pretty quickly after using it for maybe 30 minutes. Thankfully we had recharging packs and were able to recharge it while in the park. The biggest downfall that I would warn consumers about is that if you or your kids have long hair (DO NOT BUY THIS FAN). even if you plan on pulling your hair into a ponytail. We had a terrible mishap during the parade where my 9-year-old's hair was entangled into the fan blades. We had to cut off the fan and S-L-O-W-L-Y try to unwind my child's hair from the blades. I wouldn't recommend it if your kids have long hair, it's too much of a risk in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cools you the entire day!
reviews.reviewText: We wore these the entire day 4 days in a row at theme parks. They cooled us off perfectly and worked from morning to night! They were easy to charge and comfortable to wear. The lights are very cute too. We live in Florida, and I have been telling everyone to get these!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great neck fan
reviews.reviewText: I have hot flashes. This fan is great keeps me cool plus the lights look fun.

Very useful and of better quality. Fan speeds are great even at 1st speed you feel relaxed. The only con so far there is no battery status light on the outside, you have to open the batter cover to check if light is red or blue.

1. Product is not as good as showin in pictures.2. I orderd with a combination of white and red but i got complete white product.3. As they promised, it will have different color lightning(7 colors) in the product but i found no lights in the product.4. There is huge sound in the product when we turn it on.5. Its not worth to spend 599rs, for this product, it can be sold around 300rs is what i think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Works well and last a long time
reviews.reviewText: Works very well and dose not get in the way while wearing it. there is very small light Indication to tell you it’s fully charged it red and then turns blue. once charged it seems to run for quite a long time which is good. My sister thought I was mad buying it but once she used it she wanted one so let that be a review.
Very well made, powerful fan and most definitely worth the money. Would highly recommend
